kw.name: Start App
kw.doc: Sets up the application for quick launching through 'Launch Application' and starts the winappdriver Note that the winappdriver must be launched before the test eithe manually or through a script on the target machine

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. If your application has a splash screen please supply the window name of the final window that will appear. For the capabilities of appium server and Windows please check http://appium.io/docs/en/drivers/windows

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Quit Application
kw.doc: Quit application. Application can be quit while Appium session is kept alive. This keyword can be used to close application during test case or between test cases.

test.name: Setup Communication Protocol

kw.name: Switch Application
kw.doc: Switches the active application by index or alias.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Switch Application By Name
kw.doc: Switches to a currently opened window by ``window_name``. For the capabilities of appium server and Windows, Please check http://appium.io/docs/en/drivers/windows

kw.name: Save Appium Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot with a unique filename to be stored in Robot Framework compiled reports.

kw.msg: Error finding window "WinSetup" in the desktop session. Is it a top level window handle?. Message: An element could not be located on the page using the given search parameters.

kw.name: Close Application
kw.doc: Closes the current application and also close webdriver session.
